altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.ja: 魔都精兵のスレイブ

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

Sophie, a boy with vampire and human blood, is transferred from an orphanage to an institution called Clan. The school houses vampire boys who have reached their Cocoon period, or puberty in human terms. Sophie has a fateful encounter with a boy named Ul while being coldly greeted by the vampires around him. As Ul continues to research the “power of immortality” that vampires once possessed, he learns of the existence of TRUMP, the original vampire that is said to live forever, and begins to crave eternal life.

Eventually, Sophie and Ul become entangled in the deep fate surrounding the legend of immortality...

A manga adaptation of the origin story of playwright Kenichi Suemitsu’s popular series! A Gothic school fantasy that beautifully spins the conflicts of impressionable and sensitive boysー!
description.ja: 吸血種<ヴァンプ>と人間の血が流れる少年ソフィは、養護院からクランと呼ばれる施設へと入所した。そこは繭期――人間でいうところの思春期を迎えた吸血種の少年たちが集う学園。周囲の吸血種から冷ややかな目で迎えられる中、ソフィはある一人の少年と運命的な出会いを果たす。劇作家・末満健一の人気シリーズの原点となる物語をコミック化!! 繊細かつ多感な少年たちの葛藤を美しく紡ぎ出すゴシック学園ファンタジー!
description.vi: Câu chuyện xoay quanh Sophie Anderson - một con lai giữa con người và ma cà rồng (Dhampir), bị khinh ghét vì sự không thuần khiết. Tuy vậy, Sophie vẫn vượt lên những trở ngại với trái tim cao quý và luôn đầy tự hào về dòng máu của mình.

title.en: Logout Shita no wa VRMMO Janaku Honmono no Isekai deshita ~Genjitsu ni Modotte no Status ga Kowareteiru Ken~

altTitles.ja: ログアウトしたのはVRMMOじゃなく本物の異世界でした　～現実に戻ってもステータスが壊れている件～

altTitles.en: I Logged Out of the Real Other World, Not a VRMMO ~My Status Is Still Broken When I Return to Reality~

description.en:
A strange "real" world appears before the eyes of a boy who has cleared a VR game and returned! The best Musou strategy story, with mysteries and beautiful girls looming, begins here!

While testing his brand new VRMMO, Kanzaki Reito was trapped inside the game for three years. He defeated the final boss of the game and was finally freed, but what he returned to was that something odd happened to the real world. A "little sister" of his out of nowhere, Reito can still use the same ability as in the game, and monsters appear. Will Reito make use of his overwhelming power and become the savior of this world??
description.ja:
***VRゲームをクリアして戻ってきた少年の目の前に現れた、見知らぬ「現実」世界！　謎と美少女が迫りくる最高の無双攻略記、ここに開幕！！***

新作VRMMOのテストプレイ中に、ゲームの中に3年も閉じ込められた高校生・神崎怜人。
ボスを倒しついに解放されたのだが、戻ってきたのは見知らぬ現実世界だった。
見知らぬ妹の存在。ゲームと同じスキルが使え、魔物が現れる。
圧倒的な力を駆使し、怜人はこの世界の救世主となるのか…！？

---

- ![Syosetsu](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1720gr)
- [Official LN (JP)](https://dash.shueisha.co.jp/library/index/%E3%81%A8%E3%83%BC%E3%82%8F/1)

title.en: Hikikomori Renkinjutsushi wa Hikikomorenai - Oie de Nonbiri Shitai Funtouki

altTitles.ja: 引き籠り錬金術師は引き籠れない ～お家でのんびりしたい奮闘記～

altTitles.en: The Hikikomori Alchemist Can’t Live in Peace ~ Struggling to Relax at Home!

description.en:
Celes is a reclusive alchemist with good skills but no interpersonal skills.
One day, she decides to leave her home and arrives in a country town on another continent.
She begins to live there, but the medicines she makes cure intractable diseases, and when she fights, she destroys demonic beasts.
Before she knows it, the town is buzzing with activity, and the number of requests increases one after another!
The story of the struggles of a beautiful and pitiful alchemist girl who seeks a slow and unhurried life!

altTitles.ja: キングダムオブザZ
キングダムオブザゼット

description.en: Five days after the sudden appearance of zombies… The protagonist, Masaru, who is having it rough surviving at school, is splendidly saved from this predicament by high schoolers Sekigahara Miki and Nakiri Karin. Though Masaru is at first relieved, he ends up realizing their true intentions…!!
description.es: Cinco días después de la repentina aparición de los zombies… El protagonista, Masaru, que está teniendo dificultades para sobrevivir en la escuela, es salvado espléndidamente de esta situación por los estudiantes de secundaria Sekigahara Miki y Nakiri Karin. Aunque Masaru se siente aliviado al principio, termina dándose cuenta de sus verdaderas intenciones….!!
description.ru:
Встречайте старшеклассниц, что страшнее самих зомби!  
Прошло четыре дня с тех пор, как в мире вдруг объявились зомби. Главный герой, Сато Масару, едва не погиб на территории школы и был грациозно спасён двумя старшеклассницами: Сэкигахарой Мики и Нагири Карин. Даже в такой ситуации их хладнокровие было непоколебимо, и Сато вздохнул спокойно, пока не узнал истинных намерений данной парочки!.. Эти безбашенные девчонки не прочь пролить чью-то кровь и круче самих зомби! Начинаем свежую, полную переполоха историю о создании государства!

altTitles.ja: ワンフォーオール

description.en:
"You wanna play rugby together?"

Arashi is a hot-blooded first year high school student enrolled on a rugby scholarship. Calling himself "the man who stirs up a storm", he unites a peculiar group of problem children, leading them towards the peak of high school rugby, Hanazono! A youth rugby club story told by the delinquent manga legend, Yanauchi Daiju!

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

altTitles.ja: 高飛車ドレイちゃん

description.en: At the market, a man stumbles upon a particularly arrogant slave...
description.pt-br: No mercado, um homem se depara com uma escrava particularmente arrogante...

altTitles.en: I Am a Competent Pharmacist of the Obsessive Emperor
I Am the Obsessive Emperor's Talented Pharmacist

altTitles.ja: 凄腕薬師ですが、 皇帝に執着されています

altTitles.es-la: La talentosa médica del emperador obsesivo

description.es-la: ¡En cuanto poseí este cuerpo, llamé la atención de un apuesto emperador y me ofreció un puesto como su farmacéutico exclusivo...! ¡El salario y los beneficios son de primera! En ese caso, ganemos rápido y hagamos una escapada. Entonces, ¡podré disfrutar de una vida joven y rica! Pero espera, ¿qué? "¡¿Un contrato de por vida?! ¡Esto es ridículo!" No puedo convertirme en esclavo del palacio de por vida sólo porque haya estampado un sello por descuido. ¡Así que decidí escapar del emperador! "Hailey, prueba esto también." Me sirve postres dulces, "Hailey, eres una persona preciosa para mí". Me dice que soy especial, "La renuncia será difícil. Deberías haber tenido más cuidado con el contrato". ¡¿Por qué de repente este hombre está tan obsesionado conmigo?! ¿Podré renunciar a esta esclavitud sin problemas...?

title.en: I Thought My Time Was Up!

altTitles.en: I Thought I Didn't Have Long to Live!

description.en:
Lariette, the daughter of the Duke of Blanchett, was told she only had three months left to live. She decided that she didn't want to go quietly, so she decided to create and complete her bucket list! 

1. Treat her maid Anne to cakes
2. Gain independence and wealth
3. Get rid of her fiancé, the Marquis of Secreb
4. Date someone handsome for three months
5. Take a trip to the West!

...But it was only after she ran away that she realised... the fact her terminal illness was a complete misdiagnosis!

---
Lariette, the daughter of the Duke of Blanche, was diagnosed with a terminal illness and three months left to live. She decided to try to achieve her bucket list since she was going to die anyway. First, dumping an older fiancé whom she doesn't even love. Second, dating the monster Duke of Candel for three months! But it was only after she ran away from him that she realized, the fact that her terminal illness was a complete misdiagnosis!

---

3개월 시한부 진단을 받은 공녀, 라리에트. 어차피 죽을 몸, 버킷리스트(라 쓰고 미친 짓이라 읽는) 달성을 해보기로 했다. 

첫째. 약혼자를 엿 먹이기. 
둘째. 괴물 공작 아스라한과 3개월 간 연애하기!  

그러나 그에게서 도망치고 나서야 깨닫고 말았다. 시한부 진단이 완벽한 오진이라는 사실을!

description.tr:
Leydi Lariet’e bir hastalık tanısı koyulmuş ve üç aylık ömrü kaldığı söylenmişti. “Zaten öleceğim, o halde aklımdan geçen her şeyi yapabilirim!” diye düşünen leydi, nişanlısına postayı koyup acımasız dükle bir ilişkiye başlamıştı. Olacakları işler çığırından çıkmadan önce bilemezdi. Aslında kendisine yanlış bir teşhis konulmuş, kısıtlı ömrü kalmamıştı! Bay Asrazan gülümsedi ve… “Şimdi kaçmaya çalışırsan bunun bedelini ödemek zorunda kalırsın.”

description.zh:
生命只剩最后三个月？
那我要和怪物公爵谈恋爱！
得知自己的生命只剩下三个月的拉丽爱特,想着反正自己活不长，索性在死之前完成自己的愿望清单!首先解决掉未婚夫老头儿，其次和怪物公爵埃斯拉翰谈三个月的恋爱!但逃离他身边之后，拉丽爱特才知道，自己的病竟然是…？!

altTitles.ja: Over Drive Girls
超可動ガールズ

description.en:
Translated from Amazon.com.jp using google translate.

The latest work in the "Super Movable Girl" series, in which a moving beautiful girl figure rushes in and becomes a wife. A romantic comedy in which tiny cute [super movable girls] such as the girl-type planet explorer Nona, the RPG hero Bernoa, and the 2D fighting game character Subaru are involved in the otaku boy Haruto. If there is love, what is the size difference!?

title.en: Onna Chara de Isekai Teni shite Cheatppoi kedo Zako Chara na no de Medatazu Heiwa na Shomin wo Mezashimasu!

altTitles.ja: 女キャラで異世界転移してチートっぽいけど雑魚キャラなので目立たず平和な庶民を目指します！

altTitles.ja-ro: Onna Chara de Isekai Ten'i shite Cheatppoi kedo Zako Chara na no de Medatazu Heiwa na Shomin o Mezashimasu!

altTitles.en: After Reincarnating in Another World as My Sort of Cheat but Small Fry Female Character I will Strive to Live a Peaceful Life of an Ordinary Person!

description.en: A little weary salaryman. One day, after waking up… he found himself in another world in the body of a female character, Susie, from the MMORPG he liked to play. Confused, he tried an attack… and made all the monsters flee to the place people live, afraid of his destructive power that’s able to smash a mountain. Having dealt with them, he ended up saving Howard, a local tribune who invited his savior to the village, but…
description.ja: お疲れ気味のサラリーマン。ある日、目が覚めると...やりこんでいたネットゲームの女キャラ・スージィの姿で異世界転移していた。とまどいながらも攻撃を放つと...なぜか山の形を変えてしまうほどの破壊力で、人里のほうに魔獣を散らしてしまう。そしてその対処をしていた護民官ハワードを助けたことをきっかけに、村に招かれることになるのだが――

altTitles.vi: Cô Gái Thân Yêu Của Tôi

description.en:
"It seems like I'd like someone like you."

"You're really like a little pony." 

This is a slice-of-life of the romance and exploits of an adorkable and ditzy senior "little fox" and her dependable junior "little pony".
description.uk: "Здається, мені б сподобався хтось на кшталт тебе". "Ти справді як маленьке поні". Буденність про романтику та подвиги чарівної й навіженої Старшої "лисички" та її надійної Молодшої "поні".
description.zh: “我好像会喜欢你这样的人。” “你好像一匹小马。” 呆萌跳脱年上“小狐狸”和她的靠谱 “年下小马驹”的爱情事业双丰收日常 。

title.en: Ore no Level Up ga Okashi! ~ Dekiru Otoko no Isekai Tensei

altTitles.ja: 俺のレベルアップがおかしい！ ～デキる男の異世界転生～

altTitles.en: My level up is strange! ~ Reincarnation of a great Man in a Different World

altTitles.id: Level Up-ku aneh!  ~ Reinkarnasi Manusia Hebat di Dunia lain

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Level Up ga Okashi! ~ Dekiru Otoko no Isekai Tensei

description.en:
Zarmen, an adventurer who can't level up decides to retire from the adventurer business. Furthermore, in order to graduate from virginity, he decided to splurge on all the assets that he had diligently saved up since his reincarnation at a high-class brothel.

The woman who appeared in front of him was the finest woman he would ever have known. Thanks to her hospitality, Zarmen fully enjoys his first time, but at that moment, his ears hear a mysterious announcement...

[Impregnation confirmed.]
[Level up!]

"Does this mean that the more 'seeding' you do, the stronger you get?"

An extraordinary implantable foreign world adventure fantasy created by a bottom adventurer who has been at level 1 for many years levels up through sex!
description.id: Petualang "Zarmen" yang tidak bisa marah memutuskan untuk pensiun dari bisnis petualangan.  Selain itu, karena belum lulus dari keperawanan, dia memutuskan untuk membelanjakan semua kekayaan yang telah dia kumpulkan sejak dia bereinkarnasi di rumah bordil mewah.  Apa yang muncul di depannya adalah seorang wanita luar biasa yang tampaknya tidak memiliki hubungan selama sisa hidupnya.  Berkat keramahannya, Zarmen sepenuhnya menikmati seks pertamanya, tetapi pada saat dia berada dipuncaknya, sebuah pengumuman misterius muncul "Level up!" Terdengar di telinganya!  Ini adalah sebuah fantasi petualangan yang aneh dimana petualang terbawah level 1 selama bertahun-tahun tumbuh melalui segs.
description.ja:
うだつの上がらない冒険者“ザルメン”は、冒険業からの引退を決意。さらに童貞も卒業するため、転生してから今までせっせと貯めてきた全財産を高級娼館でひと思いに散財することにした。
そんな彼の前に現れたのは、彼には一生縁のなさそうな極上の女。彼女のもてなしもあり、ザルメンは初めてのセックスを十分に堪能するが、イッた瞬間、彼の耳には「着床を確認しました。レベルアップ！」という謎のアナウンスが！
「これってもしかして、“種付け”するほど強くなるってこと…？」
万年レベル1だった底辺冒険者がセックスを通して成り上がる、奇想天外な着床系異世界冒険ファンタジー！

altTitles.en: Even if I Sleep, I Rank

altTitles.ru: Даже если я сплю, я оцениваю

description.en:
“We’re only taking a break for about 30 seconds? I’m not imagining things, right?”
 “…Yes.” 

After 15 hours of hunting, Hyunsung asked to rest for a while, and after 30 seconds, he had to get up again and started hunting.
Actually, Hyunsung has a special skill.

[Thananos’ narcolepsy skill is activated.]
[You’re being forced into a sleep state.]

After sleeping for a while and waking up, I got an item? 
Pay close attention to the story of the God-Rank Class, the descendant of Thananos, the unstoppable Hyunsung.
description.fr:
« On fait une pause d’environ 30 secondes ? Je ne suis pas en train d’imaginer des choses, n’est-ce pas ? »

« …Oui. » Après 15 heures de chasse, Hyunsung a demandé à se reposer un moment, et au bout de 30 secondes, il a dû se relever et recommencer à chasser.

En fait, Hyunsung a une compétence spéciale. [La compétence narcolepsie de Thananos est activée.]

[Tu es plongé dans un état de sommeil.] Après avoir dormi un moment et m’être réveillé, j’ai obtenu un objet ?

Prêtez attention à l’histoire de la Classe de Rang Dieu, le descendant de Thananos, l’inarrêtable Hyunsung.
description.ko:
“언니, 30초쯤 쉰 거 맞지? 내 착각 아니지?"
“……응.”

15시간 사냥한 뒤 잠깐 쉬자고 하더니 30초 만에 다시 일어나 사냥을 시작한 현성.
사실 현성에게는 특별한 스킬이 있다.

[타나노스의 기면증 스킬이 발동됩니다.]
[강제로 수면 상태에 빠지게 됩니다.]

한숨 자고 일어났더니 아이템을 얻는다?
신(GOD) 등급 직업, 타나노스의 후예 멈추지 않는 현성의 호쾌한 행보를 주목하라.

title.en: Chou Ten-chan! NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE Koushiki Anthology

altTitles.ja: 超てんちゃん！ NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE公式アンソロジー

altTitles.en: OMGkawaiiAngel! NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE Official Anthology

description.en:
The Internet's Angel’s advent upon this manga world!!!

The super popular game「NEEDY GIRL OVERDOSE」's first official anthology!

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

The protagonist, who loves romance novels, possessed a character in the world of the novel as soon as she received a confession from her crush, Yejun. In the novel, she possessed a fallen aristocrat named Beatrice. Rather than having a sweet relationship, she was threatened with her life. 

Daniel, the suspicious fiance who tries to take her life every now and then, and Ellin, the cursed imperial knight that protects her from him. There were strange feelings surrounding the two.

"I want to return home!"

Will I be able to return safely without dying...?

altTitles.en: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

altTitles.ja: トニカクカワイイ

description.en:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
description.ru:
Тяжело жить, если родители дали тебе имя НАСА - да, как NASA, и каждый второй спрашивает, пойдешь ли ты в астронавты. Еще тяжелее, если в один день тебя собьет грузовик, ты встретишь любовь всей своей жизни и тут же ее потеряешь, согласившись жениться на ней. Мужик сказал, что женится - значит женись. И заверьте… Веселая комедия положений без особой логики, но с неожиданными поворотами сюжета. Ведь жена и правда с Луны?..   
  
**Tonikaku Cawaii is the official romanization.**
description.pt-br: Aceito sair com você se você se casar comigo.

altTitles.ja: ブレンド・S

description.en: At a certain café, there are many different people with unique attributes such as tsundere, little sister, etc. The new part time worker Maika has been asked by the shop owner to fill the role of super sadist?! Now, while doing her best to work hard, she also blossoms as a super sadist.
description.ru: Несчастная Майка Сакураномия до сих пор никак не может найти работу. Может, всё дело в её лице? А может и нет… Однако, это не мешает девушке удачно устроиться в кафе с красавчиком-управляющим, пусть он и немного странный.
description.pt-br: Sakuranomiya Maika é, por natureza, uma pessoa que tem má sorte e que sempre entra em problemas, mas um dia, ela acaba conhecendo Dino, que gerencia um café. No entanto, esse não é um café normal, porque as garçonetes tem que agir de com os seus "atributos".

description.en:
In the Canglan Continent, there existed a rule: only those who managed to awaken a Martial Spirit were able to pursue the path of cultivation, and a Martial Spirit's rank was determined when it was awakened. Born in Linshui City, Qin Nan was a peerless genius who possessed great talents and was highly anticipated to become a great cultivator in the future. However, things changed when he ended up awakening the lowest-grade Martial Spirit, resulting in him being considered trash.  
  
Fortunately, when Qin Nan was struck by a ray of lightning at a young age, he coincidentally obtained the atavistic Divine Battle Spirit, which was capable of ranking up, breaking the ultimate rule of the Canglan Continent. Little did he know that his Martial Spirit possessed a great secret, which would continue to be unveiled as he learns more about the story of the Divine Battle Spirit.  
  
What is the secret behind the Divine Battle Spirit? What is the curse of the Canglan Continent? Who exactly is the Divine God of Battle?  
  
Join Qin Nan and his companions along their journey, battling against various opponents, outsmarting their enemies, and seeking the answers to unveil mysteries!  
  
“Master, please bring me along on your journey battling against the Nine Heavens, will you?”  
  
*From gravitytales.com

altTitles.ja: ウスズミの果て

description.en: In a deserted post-apocalyptic metropolis riddled with a mysterious material a young girl is searching for any signs of life and supplies.
description.fr: Dans une métropole post-apocalyptique déserte criblée d'une matière mystérieuse, une jeune fille recherche tout signe de vie et des provisions.
description.tr: İnsanlığın yok olduğu bir dünyada dolaşan yalnız bir kız hakkında kıyamet sonrası bilimkurgu macerası.

description.en:
The mobilization of an organization’s members who possess a type of superpower known as the Glia Ability. The ultimate organization known as the ‘Crimson Moon’ whom even the president has to kneel down to.! This country is already the ‘country of Crimson Moon’.

The government who was trying to bring down the origin of evil, Crimson Moon, discovered Ryu Sihwan who possesses a glia ability that is on par with the leader of Crimson Moon, Shin Yeongwoo. Using his blood, a wonder drug that helps one to become younger was developed.

With that wonder drug, the previous generations’ experts / martial masters who were four of the greatest villains that had cornered Shin Yeongwoo back to when they were at their prime age…

Would the 4 great villains along with Ryu Sihwan’s potential be able to take down the Crimson Moon?
description.ko:
일종의 초능력인 글리아 능력을 가진 조직원들을 동원,
대통령조차 무릎 꿇게 만드는 절대 조직 ‘적월’!
이 나라는 이미 ‘적월의 나라’다.

악의 근원인 적월을 무너뜨릴 방법을 찾던 정부는
적월 총수 신영우에 버금가는 글리아 잠재력을 지닌 류시환을 발견하고,
그의 피를 이용하여 젊어지는 신약을 개발한다.

그 신약으로 과거의 신영우를 궁지에 몰아넣었던 전대의 고수들,
4대 악인을 전성기 시절로 되돌리는데…

4대 악인은 과연 류시환의 잠재력을 끌어올려서
적월을 무너뜨릴 수 있을 것인가?

title.en: Dou ka Ore wo Houtte Oitekure

altTitles.en: Please Leave Me Alone: For Some Reason, She Wants to Change a Lone Wolf's Helpless High School Life

altTitles.ja: どうか俺を放っておいてくれ なぜかぼっちの終わった高校生活を彼女が変えようとしてくる

altTitles.ja-ro: Dou ka Ore wo Houtte Oitekure: Naze ka Bocchi no Owatta Koukou Seikatsu wo Kanojo ga Kaeyou to shite kuru

altTitles.ja: ぼちかの

description.en:
Love, friendship, and the sparkling joys of youth. The high school life that I’ve looked forward to—still ended with me being alone. Then, just a day before the graduation ceremony...

*“Don’t die! Nanamura-kun!”*

Sora Hanamitsuji, she’s a beautiful girl that even models can’t compare to. My life ended after getting hit by a truck to protect her. That should’ve been the case.

However, with this accident, Hanamitsuji-san and I returned to the day of our high school’s entrance ceremony. The second high school life is no longer as charming and youthful. I was going to spend it modestly and alone. But, she said that won’t do.

*“Well, I’ll help you make friends.”*

This is a story about my second high school life. It’s the worst and best teenage rom-com ever.
description.ja:
恋、友情、輝かしい青春。そんな期待に胸を膨らませた俺の高校生活は――結局ぼっちのまま終わった。そして迎えた卒業式前日。クラスメイトの花見辻空をかばい、俺はトラックに轢かれて人生の幕を閉じた……はずだった。
花見辻と一緒に高校一年生の入学式に戻ってしまった俺。二度目の高校生活は輝かしい青春など期待せず大人しくぼっちで過ごそうと思いきや……。
「ぼっち脱却、私が手伝ってあげる」
この物語は俺が二度目の高校生活で送る、最悪で最高の青春ラブコメだ。GA文庫の大人気作、待望のコミカライズ!

description.en:
The descendants of mankind, born in the labyrinth and raised on the milk of monsters, possessed special strength and strong bodies. When they returned to earth, mankind referred to them as dungeon babies. Among them, Kim Jinwoo was born in the deepest labyrinth.

“I never tried to become strong, I just wanted to live.”

From the lowliest excavator to the king of the labyrinth, his life story is now unfolding.

[MU]
description.pt-br: Os descendentes da humanidade que nasceram no labirinto e foram criados com o leite dos monstros possuíam uma força especial e corpos fortes. Quando retornaram à Terra, a humanidade os chamou de bebês da masmorra. Entre eles, Kim Jinwoo nasceu no labirinto mais profundo. 'Eu nunca tentei ficar forte, eu só queria viver.' Desde o mais humilde dos escavadores até o rei do labirinto, sua história de vida agora está se revelando.

altTitles.ja: 銃夢 Last Order

description.en:
Master mangaka Yukito Kishiro returns, accompanied by his most celebrated character, cyborg sweetheart Battle Angel Alita. Meet Kishiro's latest bevy of bizarre and tormented characters and catch up with your favorite and foes!

[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/battle-angel-alita-last-order-omnibus/)

altTitles.en: I Am The Top Ranker Newbie

altTitles.th: ผู้เล่นหน้าใหม่เลเวลแมกซ์

altTitles.ja: 俺だけレベルMAXなビギナー

description.de: Jin Hyuk ist Streamer und der einzige, der das Ende des Virtual-Reality-Spiels „Turm der Prüfungen“ erlebt hat. Da das Spiel jedoch immer mehr an Beliebtheit verliert, wird auch seine Streamer-Karriere immer hoffnungsloser. Doch eines Tages wird „Turm der Prüfungen" plötzlich zur Realität und die Welt steht vor dem Abgrund. Jin Hyuk, der sich im Spiel besser auskennt als jeder andere, wird zwangsläufig zur letzten Hoffnung der Menschheit!
description.en:
Kang Jinhyeok, a gaming streamer and content creator, is the only person who has cleared the game, [Tower of Trials]. However, as the game’s popularity declines, it becomes increasingly difficult for him to continue making a living as a content creator. Jinhyeok prepares to end his 11-year-long relationship with the game and say goodbye to his humble group of subscribers. But on that very day, the Tower of Trials appears in reality with a message saying that humanity will perish unless all players clear each floor within 90 days.

Jinhyeok, who knows the game better than anyone, decides to use his knowledge to his advantage and dominate the tower. 

"It’s time to show everyone what a hardcore gamer can do!"

---

**Links:**

- [Official German Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/de/fantasy/im-the-max-level-newbie/list?title_no=3735)
- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/max-level-newbie/list?title_no=3517)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/max-level-newbie/list?title_no=3457)
description.fr: Le jeu de réalité virtuelle "La Tour de l'Épreuve" est officiellement démodé et le streamer Jinhyuk est le seul à être resté jusqu'au bout pour terminer le jeu. Quand un jour "La Tour de l'Épreuve" devient réalité, Jinhyuk qui connaît les éléments du jeu mieux que personne aura forcément un grand avantage sur les autres !
description.id: Jinhyuk, satu-satunya pemain game [MENARA UJIAN] yang menyelesaikan sampai akhir meski popularitas game telah menurun. Hingga suatu hari [MENARA UJIAN] menjadi kenyataan, Jinhyuk harus menyelesaikannya dengan segala elemen yang ia ketahui tentang game ini!
description.ja: ゲーム実況ストリーマーとして活動している主人公・鈴木裕人（すずきひろと）。彼は、万人があきらめたクソゲー『試練の塔』を挑戦しクリアした唯一のプレイヤーであった。念願のエンディングを見ることができたものの、もう誰も興味をもたないこのゲームはサービス終了が確実視されていた…。11年もかけクソゲーをクリアした裕人はこれを機に現実と向き合い、ゲーム実況者としての生活を終わらせることを決心した—。が次の日、現実世界に異変が起きる。街中に突如現れた不吉な塔、そして人類に課される生死をかけた試練。それはまさに裕人が11年の月日を費やしクリアした『試練の塔』そのものであった。塔の攻略法を把握している裕人はその経験を活かし、誰よりも強い最強のビギナーとしてあらたな試練に挑む！
description.ko:
게임 너튜버로 활동 중인 주인공 진혁은 유일하게
[시련의 탑]의 엔딩을 봤지만, 게임의 인기가 하락하며
더 이상 게임 너튜버로서의 삶도 유지하기 힘들어진다.

엔딩을 보았기에 이대로 게임을 마무리하려는 진혁.
바로 그날, [시련의 탑]은 현실이 되었다.
게임의 모든 요소를 다 알고 있는 진혁은
누구보다 빠르게 모든 것을 차지한다!

"진짜 고인물이 뭔지 보여주지."
description.ru:
Главный герой Джин Хек – игрок и стример, единственный, кто прошёл до конца «Башню испытаний».
Когда он увидел концовку игры, захотел бросить её. Но в тот же день «Башня испытания» стала реальностью. И главному герою не осталось ничего, кроме как показать, на что способен тот, кто знает все нюансы игры.

«Я покажу вам, что такое настоящий задрот!»
description.th: "จินฮยอก" สตรีมเมอร์หนุ่ม ผู้หลงใหลในการเล่นเกม ใช้เวลากว่า 11 ปี ในการบรรลุชั้นบนสุดของ '[หอคอยแห่งความทรหด] เกมแฟนตาซีเสมือนจริง' พอบรรลุเป้าหมายแล้ว จึงเกิดความคิดที่อยากจะล้มเลิกการเล่นเกม และการทำสตรีมมิ่ง แต่จู่ๆ วันหนึ่งเขาก็ตื่นมาพบว่า [หอคอยแห่งความทรหด] โผล่ขึ้นมาในชีวิตจริงซะอย่างนั้น!?
description.zh:
当游戏变为现实！
无名主播竟是唯一通关者！
男主镇赫是一名游戏主播，也是唯一一位“试炼之塔”游戏的通关玩家。随着“试炼之塔”这款游戏的热度下降，游戏主播的工作渐渐无法维持镇赫的生活。通关后的镇赫本想就此退游，然而游戏竟成为了现实。如果失败世界就会灭亡！对游戏了如指掌的镇赫还能在现实世界中通关吗？
description.zh-hk: 活躍於遊戲NewTube頻道的主角——振赫，他是唯一看過[試煉之塔]的結局，因為該款遊戲的人氣大跌，要經營NewTube頻道再也難以維持生計。 看完遊戲的結局後，原本振赫預計要結束不再玩遊戲。但就在當天，[試煉之塔]竟成為了現實。了解遊戲所有關卡的振赫，比誰都還要快占據所有物品。 「讓你見識什麼是真正的開掛高手。」

description.en:
It’s been decades since he began ruling over the Central Plains as the Heavenly Demon, but now he’s back to his original world!

Now that he’s returned, he’s started to help his father with his bakery.

Using the Mind’s Eye skill, he uncovers recipes while using Body Reformation to optimize the kneading of dough.

The strongest in the Central Plains, the Heavenly Demon, uses his martial arts to become the premier baker!
description.ko:
중원을 제패하고 천마로 군림한지 수십년,
마침내 현대로 돌아왔다!

아버지를 도와 베이커리에서 일하기 시작했다.

심안을 개방해 레시피를 파악하고,
환골탈태를 통해 반죽에 최적화 된 골격을 만든다.

중원최강의 천마, 무공으로 최강의 제빵사가 된다!

altTitles.ja: 怪異さんと俺

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/24367326/series/222807)

**Notes:**
- The Pixiv series does not contain all of the chapters and combines some. Do not follow the chapter numbering on Pixiv. Instead, enable Japanese chapters on MangaDex to see the proper chapter order and links to all of the raw chapters.
- This series uses characters the author used in illustrations beforehand.
description.ja: 俺くんと怪異さんのお話。
description.zh: 拥有灵感的少年因为能看见一般人看不见的妖怪而受排挤，于是他选择和妖怪们成为朋友的故事。

description.en:
**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"

title.en: Genshiken Nidaime - The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture II

altTitles.ja: げんしけん 二代目

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.

altTitles.vi: Sứa không thể bơi trong đêm

altTitles.en: Jellyfish Can't Swim in the Night

altTitles.ja: 夜のクラゲは泳げない

description.en: Four girls, an illustrator, a former idol, a VTuber, and a composer, form an anonymous artist group called "JELEE", each pursuing their artistic dreams while supporting one another.

altTitles.ja: マウントセレブ金田さん

description.en: Mochiko Kaneda (commonly known as Kaneda-san), a self-important, clumsy sanpaku-eyed celebrity lady, climbs to the top with overwhelming financial power!!

Park Chanmi is a cold-looking athletics freshman who remembers her past life. In past life, she loved the beautiful girl, but couldn't confess to her because the girl was already in love with a man and her life ended early and tragically. In this life, Chanmi thinks that everything will happen again, so she wants to protect her beloved one. But now her beloved one is a teacher at the university where Chanmi is studying.
description.pt-br: Park Chanmi é uma caloura de atletismo de aparência fria que se lembra de sua vida passada. Na vida passada, ela amou a linda menina, mas não podia confessar porque a menina já estava apaixonada por um homem e sua vida terminou cedo e tragicamente. Nesta vida, Chanmi acha que tudo vai acontecer de novo, então ela quer proteger sua amada. Mas agora sua amada é professora na universidade onde Chanmi está estudando.

description.en:
One day, in front of my eyes appeared a silver-haired Goddess.

[Heaven-defying Star. The existence that goes against destiny. The one and only savior of a world that was destined to meet its end—]
What kind of bullsh*t is this woman spouting?

[You must be a regressor.]
“…What?”

No, I’m not.
description.ko:
어느날.
은발의 여신이 눈 앞에 나타났다.

[역천의 별. 운명을 거스르는 존재. 종말이 지어진 세계의 유일한 구원자━]

뭔 소리 하는 거야 이 여자.

[그대가 바로 회귀자로구나.]

"…예?”


아닌데요?

altTitles.es-la: Humillando al jade y escogiendo a la perla

description.en:
When Ding Hanbai, the young master of the centuries-old jade-carving shop, first laid eyes on his timid shidi Ji Zhenzhu, he bullied him relentlessly, not expecting that Jiangnan could produce someone who would break down his defenses and melt his heart this way.   
They go from being unable to stand each other to admiring one another, but as the days pass, even this admiration begins to evolve…   
A step from brotherhood, a step to special affection, and one more step into a lifetime together.
description.es-la:
Cuando Ding Hanbai, el joven maestro de la tienda con cien años de antigüedad en la extracción de jade, puso sus ojos en su tímido shidi Ji Zhenzhu, él lo intimidó implacablemente, sin esperar que Jiangnan pudiera producir a alguien que derribara sus defensas y derritiera su corazón de esa manera.
Ellos pasaron, de no poder soportarse el uno al otro, a admirarse mutuamente, pero conforme los días iban pasando, incluso esa admiración fue evolucionando…
A un paso de la amistad, a un paso de un sentimiento especial, y un paso más hacia una vida juntos.
Nota: El título que escogimos para el manhua, se basó en uno de los varios significados de la palabra Crushing, y que se enfoca en la historia haciendo analogía en como "Ding que era un experto de tesoros, dejó de lado su pasión por estos y eligió su amor por Ji, su perla".

altTitles.ja: ぼくらの夏が裂けていく

description.en: A teenage boy returns to his remote home island from the mainland. While people stopped wearing masks there, on the island the rules to wear masks outside at all times are still surprisingly strict. Could the reason be something different than corona?

altTitles.ja: 会社と私生活

description.en:
A Twitter series about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/4729811/series/198059)
description.es-la: Los colegas con diferentes personalidades tienen una vida privada donde uno se viste como una lolita y el otro se viste como una persona funky goath.

altTitles.ja: ドリキャン！！

description.en: “Drifting is a sport!” Rin Todoroki, a natural drifting genius, just wants to put driving aside and live out a normal, comfy university life. What will happen when she is confronted by the automobile club, or “auto” for short? Students who’ve put it all on the line… their stories start here!!

title.en: I'm Not That Kind of Talent

altTitles.en: I'm Not That Kind of Person

altTitles.vi: Ta Không Tài Giỏi Đến Vậy Đâu

altTitles.es-la: No soy esa clase de talento

description.en:
I'm not that kind of person.

I, Dion Hart, am a sickly person who vomits blood whenever I'm stressed.

However, at the same time, I'm Count Hart, who has somehow been misunderstood and thought of as a strong person, and thereby feared by everyone.

---
I am a sickly person who vomits blood whenever I get stressed. Deon Hart. However, at the same time as Honorary Count Hart, who is somehow misunderstood as strong and feared by everyone in the Empire, In the demon realm, he became the commander of the 0th Corps, the most trusted by the demon king... Yes?! me? I'm not that kind of person?!

description.en:
“The complex of the boy, Choi Si-woo, is being overweight. Choi Si-woo runs and runs around his house until past midnight, and he encounters an old man on a walking trail. In the blink of an eye, the old man covers Choi Si-woo with the straw backpack he is carrying. Where Choi Si-woo had stumbled upon was an enormously wide ruined traditional Korean house (hanok).

At the edge of the spacious courtyard, surrounding him on the courtyard, there were numerous black shadows standing. To the bewildered Choi Si-woo, the old man speaks. Once every 666 years, a ceremony is held to select the king of Yokai and each Yokai in this world possesses one entry ticket for it. And Choi Si-woo is, in fact, a hybrid of a human and a goblin, inheriting the blood of an extinct goblin. Among the goblin folk, only Choi Si-woo possesses the entry ticket. As the sole survivor inheriting the blood of a goblin, the adventure of the half-monster boy, Choi Si-woo, begins.”

title.en: Umareta Chokugo ni Suterareta kedo, Zensei ga Taikensha datta node Yoyuu de Ikitemasu

altTitles.ja: 生まれた直後に捨てられたけど、前世が大賢者だったので余裕で生きてます

altTitles.en: Since My Previous Life was a Wise Man, I can Afford to Live.

description.en:
Born to excellent parents, Reus is abandoned shortly after being born due to a mismeasurement of magical aptitude. However, he was a super baby who had the memory and ability of his previous life where he was touted as a Great Sage, and was able to fly, not to mention conversation and walking!

Adventuring with the sacred dragon familiar, Lindworm, enjoy the life of a baby Sage who becomes a person and enjoys freedom!
description.ja:
見た目は赤ちゃん、だけど中身は大賢者!?

世界を変えた最強の魔法使い・大賢者アリストテレウスがその生涯を閉じた…。
だが大賢者アリストテレウスは、死んだ後に転生の魔道具を使い、転生することに成功したのだった。
転生した先は、何百、何千年経ったのかも分からない後の世界の魔法名門家の赤子。
恵まれた人生を歩むはずが、内に宿した規格外の魔力のせいか勘違いされ、生まれた直後に捨てられてしまう…!?
しかし大賢者の能力と記憶を持つ赤子は、聖竜杖リントヴルムをお供に余裕で生き抜くのだった…!!

description.en:
[The Tower of Trials has selected all suitable candidates from Earth.  Please select your difficulty.]

Seong-yun Han was just a boy when his parents were killed by monsters unleashed during a mysterious calamity called the “Dungeon Break.”

Seven years later, Seong-yun is devastated to find that his grinding efforts to become a Hunter, fierce warriors who seek out and destroy monsters, are entirely in vain, as his fighting attributes have not increased at all.

Seong-yun’s world flips on a dime when he accepts an invitation to join the Tower of Trials, an otherworldly realm where challengers must overcome trials that pit them against monsters and humans alike!
description.ko:
평생 헌터가 되지 못할 줄 알았다.
기회 같은 것은 찾아오지 않을 거라 여겼다.
하지만 아니었다.

「‘시련의 탑’이 지구 차원의 모든 적합자를 선별해냈습니다.」

「난이도를 선택해주십시오.」

「선택하는 난이도에 따라서 보상도 커집니다.」

이제 내게도 기회가 주어졌다.
그것도 아주 특별한.

description.en:
I was falsely accused of attempting to kill my younger sister, who was worshipped as a holy maiden. There was not a single person who believed in me, nor was there a person who stood up for me. Not even my blood-related family. I was fourteen years old, and it was winter. I, who was Edenbell's Fourth Princess, was miserably beheaded in front of the masses. After the end of my death, I awoke and what came was...

"My baby, my precious younger sister."

With a delightful smile, he held my small fingers. That warm gesture, warmth, and touch. He sang me a lullaby as he held me gently and swayed.

---
When Princess Alisa is framed for a terrible crime, she is shocked to learn that her own family wants her executed. After losing her will to live, she finds herself reborn as the princess of a rival empire. And though her new family acts sweet and kind on the surface, she's not sure they can be truly trusted. Luckily, with this new life comes new power. But what exactly is this mysterious magic that awakens in her? And more importantly, can she use it to get vengeance against those who once betrayed her?

---

description.fr:
Alyssa, la quatrième princesse d’Edenbell, est accusée à tort d’avoir tenté de tuer sa petite sœur. Condamnée froidement à mort par sa famille, elle se réincarne comme princesse de l’empire rival, Elmir. Dégoutée par la trahison de ses proches, elle jure de ne plus jamais aimer qui que ce soit. Mais l’empire d’Elmir est bien différent de celui d’Edenbell… Dans ce nouvel environnement, parviendra-t-elle à retrouver foi en l'humanité et à découvrir les terribles secrets qui entourent son exécution?

---
Personne n’a cru en moi, personne n’était là pour me soutenir, même ma propre famille. A ce moment-là, j’étais Alyssa, 4e princesse d’Edenbell. J’étais dans un état épouvantable et j’avais la gorge asséchée par la soif. J’ai regardé ma sœur cadette, espérant qu’elle les empêcherait de me tuer. Mais ce que j’ai vu sur son visage, c’était une expression d’extase, elle était heureuse d’assister à ma mort. Après avoir été exécutée, j’ai ouvert de nouveau mes yeux. J’étais dans le ventre de quelqu’un et je pouvais entendre des voix. Avant de retomber dans l’inconscience, j’ai entendues les paroles d’un petit garçon:

«Bienvenue, ma précieuse petite sœur,» il a ri chaleureusement, «Le monde entier t’aime.»

Je me suis réincarnée en tant que première princesse de l’empire Elmir, le rival de l’empire Edenbell!

---

description.id:
Aku dituduh mau membunuh adikku sendiri yang mendapat julukan sebagai saintess. Tidak ada seorang pun yang percaya denganku, dan tidak ada seorang pun yang melindungiku. Bahkan keluarga kandungku sendiri tidak mau mendengarkan penjelasanku sedikit pun. Pada akhirnya, aku yang merupakan putri ke-4 kekaisaran Edenberr mengakhiri hidupku dengan cara yang sadis pada usia 14 tahun. Setelah kehidupan pertamaku berakhir, saat aku membuka mata... "Sayang, adikku yang manis." Ada yang memanggilku dengan hangat. Dia memegang tanganku yang mungil sambil tersenyum. Aku bisa merasakan kehangatan darinya. Dia menggendongku sambil menyanyikan lagu tidur untukku.

description.it:
Quando la principessa Alicia viene incastrata per un terribile crimine, rimane scioccata nell'apprendere che la sua stessa famiglia vuole che sia giustiziata. Dopo aver perso la voglia di vivere, si ritrova a rinascere come la principessa di un impero rivale. E sebbene la sua nuova famiglia si comporti in modo dolce e gentile in superficie, non è sicura che ci si possa veramente fidare di loro. Fortunatamente, con questa nuova vita arriva un nuovo potere. Ma cos'è esattamente questa misteriosa magia che si risveglia in lei? E, cosa più importante, può usarla per vendicarsi di coloro che una volta l'hanno tradita?

---

description.ja:
イデンベル帝国の皇女アリサには腹違いの妹マリアンヌがいた。 金色の瞳を持ち誰からも愛される華やかな妹に対し、アリサは使用人にも冷遇を受けていた。 アリサがマリアンヌをお茶に招待した日、突然マリアンヌが血を吐き倒れる。 家族からも嫉妬したアリサが毒を入れたと決めつけられ、アリサは死刑になる。この濡れ衣はマリアンヌの陰謀だった。 もう人間には生まれ変わりたくないと神に願ったが、アリサはライバル国・エルミール帝国の皇女アイシャとして転生してしまう。 前世と正反対の愛情深い家族。特に腹違いの兄・イシスにやすらぎを感じ次第に心を開いて行く。 精霊使いの能力を持ち、賢く優しい少女へと成長するアイシャは、前世の残酷な記憶を乗り越え再び光の中で輝けるのか!?

description.ru:
Селена. Хранительница Империи. Богиня луны и мести... Неужели у меня не будет шанса отыскать справедливость и отомстить? Если так, то поскорее убейте меня. И прошу... Пускай впредь я больше никогда не появлюсь на свет человеком. Чтобы больше не сталкиваться с предательством. Чтобы избежать жизни, в которой ни единая живая душа тебя не любит. Чтобы больше не влачить жалкое существование.

description.sk:
Keď je princezná Alisa obvinená z hrozného zločinu, je šokovaná, keď sa dozvie, že jej vlastná rodina chce, aby ju popravili. Cíti sa porazená a ocitne sa znovuzrodená ako princezná znepriatelenej ríše. A hoci jej nová rodina pôsobí na povrchu milo a láskavo, nie je si istá, že sa im dá skutočne dôverovať. Našťastie s týmto novým životom prichádza nová sila. Ale čo presne je to tajomné kúzlo, ktoré sa v nej prebúdza? A čo je dôležitejšie, dokáže to využiť na pomstu tým, ktorí ju kedysi zradili?

description.en: Mio has to temporarily live with her former childhood friend Sarasa for a couple of weeks. When she opened their living room door, she saw…

Seongwu is a former special forces soldier who has returned to college after completing his national service. His ordinary life as a student is shattered during class one day when he and his fellow students are faced with a mysterious prompt asking them to “select a role.”

Seongwu chooses the necromancer, a rare ability that grants him the power to control the undead.

With the campus and outside world seemingly on the brink of collapse, Seongwu must use his newfound powers to battle fearsome monsters and help save his fellow students. But will they make it out alive?

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
description.fr:
"Quel est le métier le plus utile pour survivre dans un monde en ruine ?". Cette question apparaît devant Seong-woo alors qu'il somnole en cours. Lui et les autres étudiants ont 15 secondes pour choisir une carte parmi celles qui sont apparues devant eux. Celle choisie déterminera leurs pouvoirs qui leur permettront de survivre dans un monde chaotique, qui ressemble fortement à un jeu vidéo. Pour sa part, Seong-woo sera un nécromancien !

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

description.id:
Pekerjaan apa yang akan kau pilih untuk bertahan hidup saat dunia hancur oleh monster-monster yang tiba-tiba bermunculan?! Setelah memilih 'Necromancer' sebagai pekerjaannnya, Sungwoo dapat menjadikan monster yang telah ia kalahkan menjadi pengikutnya!

---

description.ko:
곧 세상이 멸망한다.
전설 속에나 나올 법한 몬스터들이 각지에 출현한다.
그리고 사람들을 잡아먹고, 길거리를 점령하며, 빌딩과 지하철에 던전을 만들기 시작한다.

멸망한 세계에서 살아남기 위해 단 한 가지 직업을 고를 수 있다.
당신은 무슨 직업을 고르겠는가?
"네크로맨서"

나에게는 멸망이 무대이고, 죽음이 자산이 된다.

---

description.ru:
Мир на грани разрушения. Существа, упоминания о которых встречались лишь в мифах и легендах, теперь заполоняют города, обживаются под людскими жилищами и в метро, пожирая всё живое.
А что до человечества… Ему будет предложено занять новую роль в нынешнем мире выживания.
Сонву выбрал класс «некромант», и теперь трупы, что обагряют Землю, ему только на руку.

---

description.zh:
魔物侵袭，世界灭亡在即！
退役特种兵的降维打击！
某一天，只存在于传说中的魔物们突然出现，肆意地破坏街道、撕咬人类，并且在高楼和地铁建立起了自己的巢穴…如果在灭亡的世界，能够选择一个职业，你会选择哪种职业呢？对于身为“死灵法师”的刘成宇来说，灭亡即是舞台，丧生即为资产。

description.en:
[You have entered the dungeon at Gwachun Station’s 1st Exit.]

After years of fighting for survival on planet Alphen, Kang Woojin had become a fearsome necromancer and ruler of his own territory. But now that he’s finally found a way back to Earth, he’s nothing more than a low-level player clearing dungeons for cash. Soon enough, though, Woojin’s undeniable skills have major guilds vying for his attention. And just in time, because with Woojin’s old enemy threatening invasion, those skills might be the only thing standing between humanity and destruction!
description.ko: 20년 전. 알 수 없는 이유로 아르펜 행성으로 소환된 '강우진'. 미약한 그는 잔학한 몬스터들 틈에서 살아남았고, 마침내 '만렙의 네크로맨서'로 성장했다. 그의 등장으로 아르펜의 모든 살아있는 존재들은 공포에 떨었고, 죽은 자들은 그에게 경배했다. 분수를 모르고 그에게 칼을 겨눈 자들은 싸늘한 주검이 되어 그 피로 대지를 적셨다. 그리고 아르펜으로 소환된 지 20년째 되던 날, 그토록 돌아가고 싶었던 지구로 향하는 포탈이 열린다! 그런데.. [과천역 1번 출구 던전에 입장하셨습니다.] "뭐지? 어째서 지하철역에서 몬스터가..? 왜 또 시간은 5년밖에 안 지난 거야?" 의문이 채 해결되기도 전에 서서히 지구를 옥죄어 오는 거대한 적. 트라넷과 그의 수하들. "이 X끼들. 아주 뒤지려고 여길 쳐들어와?" 절체절명의 지구, '만렙의 네크로맨서'의 분노가 세상을 구한다!
description.ru:
[Вы вошли в подземелье через первый вход на станции Квачхон]
Бывший ученик средней школы Кан У Джин обнаруживает, что после насильного призыва на чужую планету на 20 лет, он возвращается на Землю, которая уже отличается от родного дома из его воспоминаний.

Наблюдайте за становлением Кан У Джина, сильнейшего Некроманта Земли!
